info.name: Waymore Transactional Emails Service API
info.description: Complete API collection for the Waymore Transactional Emails Service. Includes authentication, email sending, status checking, admin monitoring endpoints, Routee API integration, and webhook testing.

request.description: Get a JWT token for API authentication. This is a development endpoint that generates a test token valid for 1 hour.
Get an OAuth token for Routee API authentication. Requires Routee client credentials.
Send an email using the universal template. This is the main endpoint for sending emails through the gateway.
Send an email to multiple recipients with CC.
Send an email with a webhook URL for status notifications.
Send a welcome email to new users with onboarding tips and quick start information.

item.name: Send Email - Renewal 1 Day Final Reminder

request.description: Send a final renewal reminder 1 day before subscription expires. This is the last chance to update payment details before service interruption.
Send a renewal confirmation email after successful payment. Includes billing period, amount charged, and invoice link.
Send a generic payment success confirmation for any successful transaction. Includes amount charged, payment date, and invoice link.
Send a payment failure notification for first attempt. Includes failure reason, retry schedule, and payment update link.
Send an upgrade confirmation email after successful plan upgrade. Includes plan change details, new features, and billing information.
Send a downgrade confirmation email after successful plan downgrade. Includes plan change details, new limits, and billing information.
Send a final payment failure notification with suspension warning. Urgent action required to prevent service interruption.
Send a usage threshold warning email when a user reaches 80% of their plan quota. This template includes workspace name, user details, usage statistics, and an upgrade CTA.

Send a usage limit reached email when a user hits 100% of their plan quota and is blocked from further usage. This template includes workspace name, user details, usage statistics, and an urgent upgrade CTA.
Send a renewal reminder email 7 days before subscription expiry. This template includes workspace name, user details, renewal date, and a billing management CTA.
Get the current status of a specific message by its ID.
Check the health status of the Waymore Transactional Emails Service.
Check if the service is ready to accept requests.
Get system metrics and statistics.
Access the admin dashboard for monitoring email delivery status and system health.
Get real-time data for the admin dashboard (JSON API endpoint).
Simulate a Routee webhook event for delivered status.
Simulate a Routee webhook event for opened status.
Simulate a Routee webhook event for clicked status.
Simulate a Routee webhook event for bounced status.
Simulate a Routee webhook event for sent status.
Simulate a Routee webhook event for queued status.
Send an email directly via Routee API with proper callback configuration for webhook notifications.
Get the status of a message sent via Routee API.
